welcomeMessage: Welcome to Our HomeServices Booking Platform
homeDescription: Your one-stop platform to manage, host, and book home services effortlessly.
ourStoryDescription: Born out of the need for reliable, convenient home service solutions, our platform bridges the gap between skilled professionals and customers. We strive to empower households with access to quality services while supporting service providers with the tools they need to grow.

about1.title: About HomiGo
about1.description: Welcome to HomiGo! We're transforming the way you access reliable home services by connecting you with trusted professionals at your fingertips.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: HomiGo was born out of a common challenge — the difficulty of finding skilled, dependable home service providers. From electricians and plumbers to deep cleaners and handymen, we set out to build a platform that makes booking home services simple, transparent, and trustworthy.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At HomiGo, our mission is to empower households by providing seamless access to high-quality home services. We focus on safety, convenience, and satisfaction—ensuring you get professional help when and where you need it most.

points.verifiedProfessionals: Verified Professionals: All service providers are background-checked and verified.
points.instantBooking: Instant Booking: Book services with a click—anytime, anywhere.
points.customerSupport: 24/7 Customer Support: We’re here to help you at all hours.
points.transparentPricing: Transparent Pricing: No hidden charges, just fair rates.
points.realTimeUpdates: Real-Time Updates: Stay informed with appointment reminders and tracking.

jahnavi.name: CHEVURI JAHNAVI
jahnavi.description: Ananya is the driving force behind HomiGo, committed to reshaping the home service industry through technology and user-first design.

karthik.name: Karthikeya
karthik.description: Karthik leads the development team to ensure a robust, secure, and scalable platform experience for HomiGo users.

shravya.name: Ramya
shravya.description: With a focus on user satisfaction, Shravya ensures that every HomiGo customer feels heard and supported.

expansion.title: HomiGo Expands to Tier-2 Cities
expansion.description: We’re now available in more cities, making professional home services accessible across India.

newProfessionals.title: More Skilled Experts Onboard
newProfessionals.description: HomiGo has added over 500 new service professionals across different verticals this quarter.

greenServices.title: Eco-Friendly Cleaning Launched
greenServices.description: We’ve introduced green cleaning services that are safe for kids, pets, and the planet.

howToBookService: How do I book a home service?
bookServiceAnswer: Go to the Services section, choose your required service, and click on Book Now.
rescheduleCancelBooking: Can I reschedule or cancel a booking?
rescheduleCancelAnswer: Yes, visit the My Bookings page and select the reschedule or cancel option.
providerVerificationAnswer: Yes, all our professionals go through background checks and training.
serviceHoursAnswer: We provide services from 8 AM to 9 PM, 7 days a week.
contactSupport: How do I contact customer support?
contactSupportAnswer: You can fill out the contact form below or call our 24/7 helpline.
paymentSecurityAnswer: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and processed through secure gateways.
serviceWarranty: Do I get a service warranty?
serviceWarrantyAnswer: Yes, we offer a 7-day service guarantee for most of our services.
feedbackAfterService: Can I give feedback after service?
feedbackAnswer: Absolutely! You’ll receive a link via email/SMS to rate your experience.
